title: 一个mod的几句翻译
author: hua2hua
txt_content:
本帖最后由 hua2hua 于 2019-10-27 06:00 编辑 
"Parts of this mod make use of flashing lights and images"

"Flashy Setting: None"
"No flashing lights/images"

"Flashy Setting: Low"
"Some flashing lights/images"

"Flashy Setting: Normal"
"Flashing lights/images"

"Flashy Setting: RAVE"
"For the truly daring."
"Waaaay too many flashy stuff"
"which makes the game almost"
"unplayable at times. But,"
"it looks awesome."

replies.author: Delamer
replies.txt_content:
"Parts of this mod make use of flashing lights and images"
这个模组部分使用了闪光以及图像

"Flashy Setting: None"
"No flashing lights/images"
闪烁设置:None(无)
没有闪光/图像

"Flashy Setting: Low"
"Some flashing lights/images"
闪烁设置:Low(低)
适量闪光/图像

"Flashy Setting: Normal"
"Flashing lights/images"
闪烁设置:Normal(正常)
正常闪光/图像

"Flashy Setting: RAVE"
"For the truly daring."
闪烁设置:RAVE(狂欢)[应该是狂欢吧...这么翻译也没毛病]
为勇者而提供[为大胆者提供]

"Waaaay too many flashy stuff"
"which makes the game almost"
"unplayable at times. But,"
"it looks awesome."
"过多的闪光效果,时常使得游戏几乎无法运行.但是,那看起来很棒"

不知道现在英文水准退步了多少.
